translations: 脑电图仪；[内科] 脑电描记器

sentences.sentence: Abnormal brain-wave activity shows up on electroencephalograph readings.
sentences.translation: 脑电图的读数上显示出异常的脑电波活动。

sentences.sentence: Abnormal brain - wave activity shows up on electroencephalograph readings.
sentences.translation: 脑电图的读数上显示出异常的脑电波活动。

sentences.sentence: Objective To describe characteristic of sleep electroencephalograph (EEG) in depressions with psychogenic anxiety.
sentences.translation: 目的探索精神焦虑性抑郁症的睡眠脑电图特征。
